name: Thanos Rice Krispie Infinity Stones
description: Any Marvel fan will love these Thanos Rice Krispie Treat Insanity Stones for an Avenger's movie night! You can harness the power of the Infinity Gauntlet anytime you want with these colorful and delicious Rice Krispie treats!

recipeInstructions.text: Melt 1 tbsp. butter in a medium pan on medium to low heat
recipeInstructions.name: Melt 1 tbsp. butter in a medium pan...

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 cup of miniature marshmallows and stir until the marshmallows are completely melted
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 cup of miniature marshmallows and stir...

recipeInstructions.text: Take the pan off the heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the pan off the heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add food coloring and mix until it's through the mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Add food coloring and mix until it's through...

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 cup of Rice Krispie Cereal and stir until it's mixed through.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 cup of Rice Krispie Cereal and...

recipeInstructions.text: Once the mixture is warm (not hot), make a stone out of each one with your hands.  You may want to spray your hands with non-stick spray first to help with the stickiness.
